question: Which of the following kings succeeded the king Amoghvarsha I?
explanation: Krishna II who ruled the Rashtrakuta Empire from 878 A.D. toÂ  914 A.D. ascended the Rashtrakuta throne after the demise of his father Amoghavarsha I who ruled the Rashtrakuta empire for 64 years. His Kannada name was Kannara.
